text: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language comedy horror film directed by Anees Bazmee and produced by Bhushan Kumar. Starring Kartik Aaryan, Tabu, and Kiara Advani, it is a standalone sequel of the 2007 film Bhool Bhulaiyaa directed by Priyadarshan. Principal photography of the film begun on 9 October 2019. ==Cast== * Kartik Aaryan * Tabu * Kiara Advani == References == == External links == * * Category:Indian films Category:Indian sequel films Category:T-Series films Category:Upcoming films Category:Upcoming Hindi-language films Category:Upcoming sequel films Category:Upcoming Indian films Category:Films directed by Anees Bazmee Category:Indian comedy horror films
title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
